_preset_metadata.name: Personal - GitHub Individual Project
_preset_metadata.description: Automated GitHub Flow for individual developers. All automation enabled (branches, commits, push) except PR which is suggested to user.
_preset_metadata.use_case: Individual GitHub projects, rapid development, autopilot mode

git_strategy.description: Full GitHub Flow automation for individual projects.

branch_creation.description: Personal mode: Default is manual (no branch creation). prompt_always=false + auto_enabled=true enables full automation.

automation.notes: Branch: ü§ñ auto. Commit: ü§ñ auto. PR: üí° suggested (user decides). Push: ü§ñ auto

hooks.notes: pre_commit: enforce ‚Üí formatting violations block commit. pre_push: enforce ‚Üí security checks block push. commit_msg: warn ‚Üí suggestions for conventional format

commit_style.notes: TDD cycle uses colored emoji prefixes for clear visibility in commit history

branch_strategy.notes: Automatic feature branch creation from SPEC. Auto-cleanup after merge.

step_1_plan.notes: SPEC file created in .moai/specs/SPEC-001/. Feature branch automatically created and checked out.

step_2_ready.notes: No manual branch creation needed. Alfred handles everything.

step_3_run.notes: Automatic commits pushed to feature branch. Formatting enforced.

step_4_sync.notes: Documentation auto-committed. Alfred suggests creating PR to main.

step_5_review.instruction: Review commits and decide on PR
step_5_review.notes: User reviews commits on feature branch. Decides whether to create PR.

test_coverage.notes: 85% minimum coverage enforced during /moai:2-run. Warnings shown, not blocking.

formatting.notes: Formatting violations block commit at pre_commit hook.

security.notes: Security scanning during pre_push. Secrets detection blocks push.

github_integration.push_timing: after each commit during TDD phases
github_integration.notes: Full automation except PR which requires user decision. PR creation suggested, not automatic.

workflow_comparison.vs_manual: Personal adds: auto branch creation, auto push, GitHub integration
workflow_comparison.vs_team: Personal differs: no auto PR, no branch protection, no required reviews

notes.ideal_for: Individual developers using GitHub for their projects. Want maximum automation without team management overhead.
notes.workflow_time: Fast (autopilot mode). No waiting for reviews.
notes.collaboration: Suitable for solo projects on GitHub
best_practices: 1. Always review auto-commits on feature branch before PR
3. Test locally before PR (optional, but recommended)
4. Create PR for each SPEC to maintain history
